DOC.criteria: Male female ≥18 year age If female , subject child bear potential female subject childbearing potential must agree use medically approve method birth control negative urine pregnancy test result . Healthy determine laboratory result medical history Normal BMI 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 Has give voluntary , write , inform consent participate study Women pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant course trial Subject clinically significant medical condition Subject require use prescribed medication ( birth control ) Use illicit drug history drug alcohol abuse past 5 year ( currently 2 standard alcoholic drink per day ) Participation clinical research trial within 30 day prior randomization Clinically significant abnormal laboratory result screen Allergy sensitivity test product ingredient Individuals cognitively impair and/or unable give inform consent Any condition Investigator 's opinion may adversely affect subject 's ability complete study measure may pose significant risk subject
